item.title: Redesign #N
item.description: I started my journey of programming in anything other than C/C++ way back in 2013. At the time I had terrible knowledge of git, formatting in general, markdown was a really foreign thing and I was not comfortable getting my hands dirty with different programming languages without “learning” the language itself first. I however, was one to experiment and even though I had a real bad artistic sense, I do like to think I had a decent sense of aesthetics.
